syllabus:
此為進階課程, 主題為對稱函數與相關理論. 修課學生建議需有研所組合I/II 與大學部進階代數之基礎. 本課程為研究論文導向, 每個學生會指定若干篇前研學術論文研讀並報告.

This is an advanced topic course on enumerative/algebraic combinatorics. We will focus around the symmetric functions and relative ones. The following preliminaries are strongly recommended (Graduate combinatorics I/II, Undergraduate advanced algebra) before taking this course.  This course is research paper-oriented. Each student will be assigned research papers for studying and delivering oral report.
